name: UIImageView
desc: An object that displays a single image or a sequence of animated images in your interface.

items.name: init(image: UIImage?)
items.desc: Returns an image view initialized with the specified image.

items.name: init(image: UIImage?, highlightedImage: UIImage?)
items.desc: Returns an image view initialized with the specified regular and highlighted images.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image displayed in the image view.

items.name: var highlightedImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The highlighted image displayed in the image view.

items.name: var animationImages: [UIImage]?
items.desc: An array of UIImage objects to use for an animation.

items.name: var highlightedAnimationImages: [UIImage]?
items.desc: An array of UIImage objects to use for an animation when the view is highlighted.

items.name: var animationDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time it takes to go through one cycle of the images.

items.name: var animationRepeatCount: Int
items.desc: Specifies the number of times to repeat the animation.

items.name: func startAnimating()
items.desc: Starts animating the images in the receiver.

items.name: func stopAnimating()
items.desc: Stops animating the images in the receiver.

items.name: var isAnimating: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the animation is running.

items.name: var preferredSymbolConfiguration: UIImage.SymbolConfiguration?
items.desc: The configuration values to use when rendering the image.

items.name: var isUserInteractionEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether user events are ignored and removed from the event queue.

items.name: var isHighlighted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the image is highlighted.

items.name: var tintColor: UIColor!
items.desc: A color used to tint template images in the view hierarchy.

items.name: var adjustsImageWhenAncestorFocused: Bool
items.desc: Allows UIImageView to respond when an ancestor becomes focused.

items.name: var focusedFrameGuide: UILayoutGuide
items.desc: The layout guide to use when the image view is focused.

items.name: var masksFocusEffectToContents: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the floating focused appearance uses the image's alpha channel.

items.name: var overlayContentView: UIView
items.desc: A view for hosting layered content on top of the image view.
